parameters.name: index_name
parameters.description: (string) Name of the vector index to synchronize. Must be a Delta Sync Index.

200.description: Successful response indicating the sync process has been initiated.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Triggers a synchronization process for a specified vector index.
